alert.note: Alert for Tift; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 5:41PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Tift and east central Worth Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 541 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ty Ty, or near Tifton. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tifton, Sylvester, Omega, Poulan, Ty Ty, Phillipsburg, Unionville, Sumner, Tift Airport, Hillsdale, Chula and Sunsweet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
